info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 6:10PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Phillips and southwestern Valley Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 610 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles northwest of Hell Creek Rec Area, or 31 miles southwest of Glasgow, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Content. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
